    Bryan Thompson
    See Also:
    Federated Query and Custom Services

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void startConnection(BigdataSail.BigdataSailConnection conn)
      Callback is used to notify the ServiceFactory of connection starts.

      • Methods inherited from interface com.bigdata.rdf.sparql.ast.service.ServiceFactory

        create, getDesiredBound, getRequiredBound, getServiceOptions

    • Method Detail

      • startConnection

        void startConnection(BigdataSail.BigdataSailConnection conn)
        Callback is used to notify the ServiceFactory of connection starts. If the service wishes to be notified of updates, then it must return a IChangeLog implementation here. The listener will be obtained when the ServiceFactory is registered.

        Note: This is not invoked unless you are using a BigdataSail.BigdataSailConnection. Updates that are made directly using an AbstractTripleStore are not visible to the service.
